Episodes.Title: The Ladybug Festival
Episodes.Plot: The gang heads to the Ladybug Festival and Tolee leads the way through the woods, but Rintoo and Hoho chatter so much they can't hear Tolee's directions. Kai-lan then tries explaining to her pals how important it is to listen to others.

Episodes.Title: The Dinosaur Balloon
Episodes.Plot: The gang members work on making a dinosaur-shaped balloon for a festival, and they learn the importance of pitching in after Stompy initially shows some reluctance to helping Kai-lan fix a balloon she broke.

Episodes.Title: Playtimes at Tolee's
Episodes.Plot: While at a party at Tolee's house, Rintoo accidentally tears Tolee's new painting. Kai-lan then stresses the importance of forgiveness to a very upset Tolee.

Episodes.Title: The Moon Festival
Episodes.Plot: Hoho is thrilled that he gets to stay awake for his first Chinese Moon Festival, but soon be becomes disappointed when a cloudy sky hides the moon.

Episodes.Title: Kai-lan's Big Play
Episodes.Plot: Hoho doesn't get the part he wants in a play about the Monkey King, so he lets his anger get the best of him and quits the play. Kai-lan then tries to get him to express his frustration in a calm way.

Episodes.Title: Kai-lan's Big Surprise
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan wants to throw a thank-you party for Ye ye, but when nothing goes as planned, she gets frustrated and starts crying. Her pals then show her how to rely on humor to get through disappointing situations.

Episodes.Title: Stompy Rides Again
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan and her buddies go on a train ride and realize there isn't room for their elephant pal Stompy, so they build a new train car for Stompy.

Episodes.Title: Rintoo's Big Flip
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan and her pals get to take part in a show with the Chinese Rabbit Acrobats. However, Rintoo doesn't practice his flips, so he quits the show.

Episodes.Title: Rintoo Makes a Splash
Episodes.Plot: The gang goes to a water park, where Rintoo annoys everyone with his roughhousing.

Episodes.Title: The Ants Dance
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan's band and some dancing ants prepare for a talent show, but the show is almost ruined when a bossy ant tries to control the dance number.

Episodes.Title: Lulu's Cloud
Episodes.Plot: Rintoo refuses to give Tolee a turn steering the dinosaur boat.

Episodes.Title: Tolee's Turn
Episodes.Plot: When Kai-lan and her friends build a snow coaster, Rintoo takes over all of Hoho's jobs.

Episodes.Title: Hula Duck Dance Party
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan and her friends travel to Lulu's magical house in the clouds.

Episodes.Title: Pandy's Puddle
Episodes.Plot: Hoho gets mad and hits Rintoo when he can not find the art supplies that he wants.

Episodes.Title: Kai-lan's Snowcoaster
Episodes.Plot: Tolee is upset when his beloved stuffed panda is taken away to be cleaned.

Episodes.Title: Kai-lan's Playhouse
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan and her friends promise to help make a new merry-go-round for the snails' carnival.

Episodes.Title: Tolee's Promise
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan and her friends learn about the importance of taking care of the environment after they leave trash in the backyard.

Episodes.Title: The Place Where We All Live
Episodes.Plot: Tolee is left out of all the party games at the Hula Ducks' island beach house.

Episodes.Title: Princess Kai-lan
Episodes.Plot: When the Monkey King visits Kai-lan and her friends, he needs her help in a magical kingdom where the foxes and the bears do not talk to each other. Kai-lan and her friends travel to the kingdom of foxes and bears to try and get them to talk to each other, but it may prove to be Kai-lan's greatest challenge yet.

Episodes.Title: Princess Kai-lan
Episodes.Plot: Kai-lan and her friends must travel to a magical kingdom to try to get the Fox King and the Bear Queen together so they can encourage all the foxes and bears to become friends.
